column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered the Malnati salad
column2: as well as "The Lou" with sausage added on top (chunks
column3: not crumbled pieces covering the top) with Malnati's World Famous Buttercrust. The salad was absolutely delicious
column4: especially because of the housemade dressing that it had. The pizza itself
column6: was extremely underwhelming. The buttercrust really had no flavor - it just felt like we were eating plain butter. The tomatoes weren't very sweet
column7: but they were okay. The sausage
column9: was delicious. I wish there had been more of it on top.
